nodes.text: The Anga system was a star system located in the Sarka sector of the Mid Rim.

The bounty hunter Dengar believed Boba Fett had taken the carbonite-frozen Han Solo to the Anga system. While incarcerated in Keldabe on Mandalore, Dengar informed Leia Organa of Solo's supposed whereabouts, though the information proved to be a false lead.
